articles.title: 'My life was saved by a stranger on the other side of the world' - BBC
articles.description: An Australian man meets his stem-cell donor for the first time after travelling to the UK.
articles.content:
Fi Lamdin & Emma Petrie
Luke Melling, right, meets Alastair Hawken three years after a life-saving stem cell donation
A man with a rare form of blood cancer has travelled 10,000 miles to meet t… [+5590 chars]
